resources.string: You must know that there are multiple facebook friends with this name and facebook doesn\'t allow me to remember this setting. Sorry for that. But you can always synchronize this contact manually.
Do you really want to connect "%1$s" with "%2$s"?
Do you want to remove this bond?\nYou will have to remove the assigned photo manually.
Do you really want to cancel automatic synchronization for this contact?
Pick facebook friend who will be connected to "%1$s" from your contacts
You didn\'t grant me full access to your contacts. I cannot sync them.
All prerequirements are fulfilled - I have access to your contacts and you\'re logged in to Facebook account. We can start the process now!
In order to sync your contact images I need an access to your Facebook account. I will use it only to obtain profile images of your friends. Please press the button to login to Facebook.
In order to sync your contact images I need an access to your contacts. I will have to read them and modify if I will find a proper image. Please press the button to grant me access.
To continue, you have to login to facebook.
You forbid to use battery optimization. It doesn\'t allow me to work properly.

Application may be put on the Samsung\'s Smart Manager\'s battery optimization list. If it happens your contacts\' photos won\'t be synchronized automatically. To prevent it from happening, you can disable optimization for this application. You\'ll have to click on \"DETAIL\" button, tap \"Photo Syncer\" on the list, and disable optimization.
I\'ve just synchronized my contact\'s photos using PhotoSyncer for Android!
